attributes.action: reduce the usage of the words "skills", and the exercise of "targets" and "evaluations" in Schools.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details: Your petition needs to be an action that government can act on, such as introducing legislation. It is possible your petition overlaps with this one http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/getridofsats/
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
